output_list.code: function distributeFUD(address[] addresses, uint256 _value, uint256 _ethbal) onlyOwner {
output_list.reason: The function distributeFUD is vulnerable to integer overflow. The variable _value is declared as uint256, but it is used in a subtraction operation in the line 'balances[owner] -= _value'. If the value of _value is greater than the current balance of the contract owner, it will cause an integer overflow. This can lead to incorrect results and potentially loss of funds.
The function balanceOf is returning the balance of the contract owner instead of the balance of the provided address. This can lead to incorrect results and potentially loss of funds.
The function getEthBalance is returning the balance of the contract owner instead of the balance of the provided address. This can lead to incorrect results and potentially loss of funds.
